attributes.action: take action to reduce the influence exerted on the British media by Rupert Murdoch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With his mutliple ownership of  newspaper titles and Sky's increasing monopolisation of TV this individual is exerting an unhealthy influence on the British public. I believe it is against national interest for one man to have such power - particuarly a non-national

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
